html:
4.13.21  11:37 am   My clock was telling the time all wrong so I slowed it off the wall, and it broke. What do I do now?

      you're gonna have to get a new house

4.13.21  11:08 am   How do you make your videos?

      i'm not sure

4.13.21  10:55 am   I have terminal stupidity. What can I do about that?

      make a new competitor organization to MENSA

4.13.21  10:47 am   is it finally time for a title anagram?

     no

      if so what anagram do you have for us?

     i might adjust the title

4.13.21  10:43 am   why is book contains word ? 

      it seems almost too perfect

4.13.21  10:24 am   do you like to history

      yes, and future

4.13.21  10:10 am   Is "yes" a sentence? 

      sure

4.13.21  10:02 am   do you think the quality of recording is important in recording music? 

      the most important thing is that you can hear the song

4.13.21  8:00 am   opinion on silly things?

      your opinion is that they are silly. but i know which things they are, because you didn't tell me which things, only your opinion

4.13.21  7:57 am   what is the bad thing you did?

      failed at producing a song too quickly nor too slowly, and accidentally ended up working on it for exactly the right amount of time

4.13.21  7:06 am   Are there anagrams in your videos?

      occasionally

4.13.21  5:52 am   what does it feel like to write chaotic songs?

      bad

4.13.21  4:57 am   What is your opinion in literature?

      it's probably old. i've never heard anything new be called literature

4.13.21  3:39 am   Do you consider the animations you make a necessary part of your songs? 

      no but they are useful for the delivery

4.13.21  2:40 am   how would you describe the sensation of living

      it's like a roller coaster but it's free

4.13.21  12:16 am   What is 0 divided by 0?

      don't worry about it

4.12.21  10:42 pm   how to prevent static when making music? I recently started getting into this, and sometimes I hear a crackling sound 

      you're going to have to figure out exactly which device or cable is making the static. try testing each component individually, so you can find out which one is making the static and banish it

4.12.21  9:50 pm   when will you make a new video

      doing it now

4.12.21  9:09 pm   Are you a time traveler

      it's impossible to travel without time

4.12.21  7:24 pm   how do i please the youtube algorithm

      spend a lot of time watching youtube

4.12.21  5:48 pm   do you think you will someday create a song so satisfying that you no longer feel the need to create more songs

      i don't think so, but, maybe

4.12.21  5:30 pm   What if I don't like writing?

      don't do it

4.12.21  4:00 pm   does retirement mean putting new tires onto cars that have old tires?

      no

4.12.21  3:59 pm   Do you like clouds

      yes

4.12.21  3:42 pm   How do I manage my time between school, work and my social life?

      do it all at the same time. do work socially during school

4.12.21  2:54 pm   what's the significance of the trash mountain

      i made a mountain that was clearly trash, so it made me feel better to label it trash mountain. but then, as time went by and more things unfolded, i realized there was more trash than could ever be labeled, so i probably threw the sign into space somewhere

4.12.21  2:26 pm   what is your opinion om trees

      i like the idea

4.12.21  2:08 pm   do you live under a rock?

      next to it

4.12.21  1:51 pm   why is my brain always on

      because you are ~alive~

4.12.21  1:10 pm   Does 'occasionally pick up the phone when it rings' mean you pick up the phone occasionally because it rings occasionally and you always pick it up, or that when it rings you might not pick it up?

      it's not specified how often the phone rings unanswered. that much is left to the imagination

4.12.21  12:54 pm   why is there almost always a short sentence at the end of your songs? for example, "if this song ain't good enough i'll erase it" in here comes the sun or "i just did a strange thing, now everythings pink" in i just did a bad thing 

      those seem like medium sized sentences, but, the reason song lyrics contain sentences is it's like a vehicle to deliver ideas

4.12.21  12:50 pm   do you ever use periods in your answers? 

      yes. i use them between sentences

4.12.21  12:27 pm   How do you handle tough situations?

      write a research paper first, on how to deal with it

4.12.21  11:09 am   When i play piano both of my hands want to do the same thing. How do i fix this?

      first figure out what you want them to do. there are some key questions to ask first: are you playing by yourself? who has the melody? (your voice, your hand, someone else's voice or hand, etc). Who is playing bass? (your left hand, someone else,)... Who is playing the chords? (you, someone else)... The answer to these questions will determine what each of your hands should be doing. and then there are different strategies depending on how many jobs you have to do. In some cases, maybe your hands only have 1 job, in which case it's not a bad idea to put 1 hand behind your back

4.12.21  11:06 am   What is your opinion on mars

      needs some decoration

4.12.21  8:22 am   do you think talent is something you're born with or is it something that anyone can develop with enough time and practice

      it's both. everyone is born with it and then they can make it even better

4.12.21  6:37 am   You like cars?

      i like the "go" aspect they have to them

4.12.21  6:31 am   something i have NEVER been able to understand is how you are able to pretend you're on TV. like, i can't pull the trick off on myself. i know in my heart that i'm faking it, so i give myself too many excuses "in front of the camera" and the performance of productivity all falls apart. I understand you have the Reality series promise to yourself, so you're not exactly faking your performance, but i do NOT want to commit to actually producing my daily errant musings. im too distracted and upset and i can't keep up my guard as pretend TV host. how is this handled?????

      i'm pretty sure the way i do it is unusual. i've recommended it to a lot of people, but i've started to realize that it probably doesn't work for most people. But, what i'm certain of, is that something else will. and it may be similar in some ways

4.12.21  12:26 am   Will you ever release a full album?

      would be too full. won't fit all the songs. gonna just release songs individually. doing it this way has a lot of benefits for everyone, i feel

4.11.21  11:46 pm   what motivates you to live through every day?

     goals

      lately ive been going through a dark time and your songs always seem to be so upbeat and happy. they help me alot lol i made "mmmm buckets" my ringtone just so it can make me smile a little throughout my day

4.11.21  11:13 pm   Do you have enough time to say the things you want to say, and do the things you want to do?

      it depends on how simple i'm willing to get with it

4.11.21  10:52 pm   have you ever been in all places you list on your songs?

      some of them but not all of them

4.11.21  8:35 pm   I believe you've said before, but correct me if I'm wrong, that it's important to spend time with an instrument without singing and the voice will eventually join in naturally given enough time/comfortability.

     i didn't say that. but that may work, depending on your goals

     I think I'm in that process with the piano right now. And I'm just clarifying that eventually my voice will get comfortable...it's just hard to focus on the two things at the moment. 

     some people have a lot of trouble breaking the ice with the voice. some people have no trouble and they've never been afraid to use their voice. some people don't feel it's important to use their voice. some people feel it's very important. a lot of different scenarios here

4.11.21  8:29 pm   how do you get things done if things look so darn complicated

      one weird trick which nay sayers HATE is to do it really simple

4.11.21  7:43 pm   any tips for recording foley

      you gotta get inside the story

4.11.21  7:35 pm   I am incapable of doing any work at all until it's due in a few hours. Why am I like this.

      you may have greater ambitions than the work someone has assigned you

4.11.21  6:41 pm   does it bother you that the word "long" is shorter than the word "short"?

      no

4.11.21  5:53 pm   What's your favorite time signature?

      'reasonable'

4.11.21  4:49 pm   what is your favourite song that you haven't made yet whatsoever?

      in the future

4.11.21  2:31 pm   When making a video, do you just do the whole thing one moment at a time or do you make the skeleton and then go back and add whatever needs to be added?

      i do way too much
